item.description:
The first of the Triatha-newbie workouts kicks off on Tuesday!

Workouts will run as follows:

Tuesdays and Thursdays at 6:30 pm (for usually 1 hour)
Sundays at 8 am (for 2+ hours)


Tuesday, 7/22/08

Ride: Novice Hills Workout - Bike
Start: Washington Square, Brookline
Finish: Washington Square, Brookline
Description: Nice coasting downhill leads to first hill, followed by up and downs, another hill, some flat, another large hill, some extended flat, a downhill, then plenty of graded uphill, followed by a coasting downhill run back to starting point. (The real-life version of the hills workout you do on the bike or treadmill)
Distance: 7.65 miles
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting on a bench outside with a bike
item.name: Novice Hills Workout - Bike
